document_data.name: Urda Malo
document_data.formerhomes: [[Riatavin]], [[Amn]]{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20200803191807/https://twitter.com/TheEdVerse/status/1290366022038556674| title = TheEdVerse on Twitter| accessdate = 31-3-2022| date = 3-8-2020}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Urda Malo''' was a baker who lived in the village of [[Eveningstar]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Urda was a thin, tall, and gruff woman who seemed never to gain weight despite eating and drinking excessively.
document_data.Activities: Urda ran the [[Eveningstar Bakery]] located along the [[High Road (Cormyr)|High Road]] near the center of the village. Her daughters helped run the bakery.
document_data.History: Urda Malo was an orphan from [[Riatavin]] in [[Amn]]. Eventually, she settled in Eveningstar and opened her famous bakery. When she reached her frail twilight years, Urda hired a small army of local women to be her live-in assistants. When Urda became senile, the women completely took over the bakery but continued to care for the old woman until her death of [[winterchill fever]]. These assistants continued operating Eveningstar Bakery, and as of the late-15{{th}} century DR, their children continued Urda Malo's legacy of making superb bread.
